service.tut.pori.apilta.sensors.reference

Class SensorsReferenceCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • service.tut.pori.apilta.sensors.reference.SensorsReferenceCore

  • public final class SensorsReferenceCore
extends java.lang.Object
    The reference implementations for Content Analysis Service.
